item.title: Curation of Reading Lists

item.title: Smile to Win : How do Candidates' Smiles Affect Election Outcomes?
item.description: How do candidatesâ€™ appearance affect election outcomes? This study investigates the effect of smiles on vote shares using election posters of candidates running in South Korean local elections.

item.title: Strategic Allocation of Political Fund and Re-election of Incumbents in South Korea
item.description: This paper investigates how different patterns of political fund spending are related to the odds of being re-election based on the 19th and 20th legislators' expenditures of political funds.

item.title: Voting against in the 2017 French presidential election
item.description: Do voters vote for the candidate they like or vote against their dislike? This paper aims to broaden the understanding of voting behavior and expand the scope of voting models by incorporating loss aversion, the central concept of the prospect theory, into the traditional proximity model.
